item.title: Dow sinks 2.9% after rate cut fails to stem market's dread
item.description: NEW YORK (AP) — Peril and uncertainty proceed to manipulate Wall Road, and stocks fell sharply Tuesday after an emergency interest-rate cleave by the Federal Reserve failed to reassure markets wracked by worries that a quick-spreading virus will slam corporate earnings and the economic system.
